title: Current direction in loop magnetic field decreases

content.question: A single circular loop of wire in the plane of the page is perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field B directed out of the page, as shown above. If the magnitude of the magnetic field is decreasing, then the induced current in the wire is

choices.label: directed upward out of the paper

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
